commentsList.options.disableComments:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to disable comments for a solution
**UI Location**: Community Solutions → Comments List → Options dropdown
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution as its author and comments are currently enabled
**Technical Context**: Appears as an option in a dropdown menu. No variables.
**Current English**: "Disable comments…"
commentsList.options.enableComments:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to enable comments for a solution
**UI Location**: Community Solutions → Comments List → Options dropdown
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution as its author and comments are currently disabled
**Technical Context**: Appears as an option in a dropdown menu. No variables.
**Current English**: "Enable comments…"
commentsList.header.writeComment:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the comment submission section
**UI Location**: Community Solutions → Comments List (header)
**When Users See This**: Above the form for adding a new comment to a solution
**Technical Context**: Standard text. No variables.
**Current English**: "Write a comment"
